quests.name: Strange Alien Rocks....
quests.description: You obtained notes on a strange but very rare type of ore. It seems to contain vast amounce of trace minerals, most extremely rare. Obtaining this may prove difficult however. It can allegedly be mined from an orbital platform, although there may be some magical way of also creating it.

quests.name: Sizing up the Elements
quests.description: To start the proces of refinement, the mineral sizer should suffice to crush the ore into more meaningful shard clusters.

quests.name: Alloyer
quests.description: Now that you've broken the minerals down you'll need a machine capable of alloying up to 9 different constituent components to create an array of alloying possibilities. The metal alloyer will work for this.

quests.name: Fuel upgrade
quests.description: Running these new machines gets expensive in raw materials it seems. Converting them to RF seems to be a good goal.

quests.name: Laboratory Expansion
quests.description: These new rocks seem particularly difficulty to break down. You've devised a series of chemical reactions that should do the trick but you're going to need specialized equipment to produce the nescesary acids.
